original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close steady, rupee 323.00/323.50 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds closed steady, dealers said while the spot US dollar opened unchanged at 323.00/323.50 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed higher at 15.85/16.00 percent after opening at 15.30 percent on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2028 closed down at 15.05/20 percent after opening at 15.10/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed steady at 13.20/50 percent after opening at 13.10/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 and 01.07.2025 have not been quoted. (Colombo/July14/2023)
